category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_update_prop
preference.preference_description: Activates the system's update of object properties performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the beginning of the operation to the display of all objects. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the update object properties performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the update object properties performance transaction.
